official_title: To suspend temporarily the rate of duty on N-[(4-methoxymethyl)-1-phenylmethyl-4-piperidinyl]N-phenylpr opanamide-ethanedioate.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily suspend the duty on N-[(4-methoxymethyl)-1-phenylmethyl-4-piperidinyl]N-phenylpropanamide-ethanedioate.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the rate of duty on N-[(4-methoxymethyl)-1-phenylmethyl-4-piperidinyl]N-phenylpr opanamide-ethanedioate.
